explains: n. [园艺] 生菜；莴苣；（美）纸币
wordGroup: iceberg lettuce 卷心莴苣；球叶莴苣
romaine lettuce 直立莴苣；长叶莴苣
leaf lettuce 散叶莴苣；油麦菜

sentences.en: Lettuce was grown by the ancient Romans.
sentences.cn: 莴苣是由古罗马人种植的。

sentences.en: The salad consisted of a few leaves of sad-looking lettuce.
sentences.cn: 色拉就是几片生菜的残叶。

sentences.en: Why does it feel like even the lettuce is out to get us?
sentences.cn: 为什么感觉甚至连莴苣都对我们不利呢？
